sentence.Network_en: There's growing disenchant-ment with the Government.
sentence.Network_cn: 大家对政府的幻想渐渐破灭了。

sentence.Network_en: If something could disenchant voters, it would be the image of a political leader who is relying on an omnipotent image to woo votes.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个依赖以往的成绩和无所不能的形象来争取选票的政治领导人, 只会使选民感到失望.

sentence.Network_en: Disenchant - Damages all summoned units in an area.
sentence.Network_cn: 清醒 - 伤害一定区域的所有召唤生物.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French désenchanter, from dés- (expressing reversal) + enchanter (see enchant)
